creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
See Bug 58897.

It's not possible to instantiate RSyntaxtTextArea if the code is running Headless.

This is not the case for JTextArea, which can at least be instantiated, even if
it cannot be used.

creator: sebb@apache.org
